comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm resisting with every fiber of my being the urge to Photoshop iSean's pic. It's a colossal tug-of-war, this battle between my better judgement and humanity and the almost overwhelming desire to drop something evil into that right hand of his... but what? Hmmm.... DU

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Hi Dave, I think his right hand should have a toupee and you should give us a preview of what he'll look like on March 12th. Maybe you could give us a partial view, like give him a [mohawk](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohawk_hairstyle)?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Hey Mark, that would be "clean cut" humor, which rests well outside my _ouevre_. I can do it, just not very well. No, what I'm thinking of is truly ugly, mean-spirited, and nefarious. That's what I was schooled for and - alas for poor iSean - that's what I'll do. Now I just have to find a picture of a cabbage, a nurse, a bicycle, and a bus-full of Swedish car salesmen. Hmmm.... DU
